page.title: 18TOURISM
page.content:
Tourism is a very important industry to the area.The surrounding countryside is very beautiful.It is a popular place to stay as it is within easy travelling distance of 3 National Parks:the North York Moors,the Yorkshire Dales and the Lake District.
There are 2 caravan parks within the area,1 at Constable Burton Hall and the other at Akebar.This latter consists of 56 acres,with room for 380 caravans altogether.It has on site a golf course,swimming pool,Bar,cafe, sauna,tennis courts,child's inflatable dinghy pool,fishing and a shop.
As well as these facilities for the tourists, some places do Bed and Breakfast as there are more visitors every year.
